ðŸ“– Summary: noScribe is a free and open-source AI-based software for automated audio transcription, primarily designed for qualitative social research and journalistic use. It leverages Whisper and pyannote for transcription and speaker identification, running locally without sending data to the internet, and includes an editor for reviewing and correcting transcripts.
